title: Waterworld
brief_description: A ridiculed adaptation of the Kevin Costner vehicle Waterworld, which translated the Mad Max narrative from the desert to the sea.

constellations_other.name: Cartoon classics and criticism
constellations_other.description: A whole cavalcade of cartoons have successfully made the leap into arcades and onto consoles, but the relationship between cinema and videogames is far more likely to fizzle out.

description: The sun. For millions of years the source of life. But for one planet the source of it’s demise. The temperature climbed, the vast pools of ice at it’s poles melted, and the oceans rose. Centuries later, few people remained on this planet, once called Earth. A lone mariner sails the expanse of water, trading to survive. For survival, is all these people do, in this place they know only as Waterworld.
